name: Ping (itch) (Zoe Rowbotham)
description:
My first piece of coursework for the Entertainment Software Development module in my Games Technology degree. 

This is a simple Pong clone built in C++ with multiplayer or singleplayer mode, made with a very basic AI. In order to win you need to score 10 points.

Uses the ASGE engine given to us which provides basic window and sprite functionality.
